name: DEGMO
description:
In this game, you can play as a Dragon/Bear where you move around destroying people.

You have to stop the humans from getting away.

For this, you can use your powers of throwing fire (dragon) or rocks (bear) by clicking on the button.

You can change into the required form by clicking on the 'Change' button.

If the humans get away from you, you lose.

If you catch them, you win.

so enjoyyyyyyyyyyyyyy
